definition: sword and spear/weapons
knife/blade/single-edged sword/cutlass/CL:把[ba3]/(slang) dollar (loanword)/classifier for sets of one hundred sheets (of paper)/classifier for knife cuts or stabs
surname Dao
gun/firearm/rifle/spear/thing with shape or function similar to a gun/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3],桿|杆[gan3],條|条[tiao2],枝[zhi1]/to substitute for another person in a test/to knock/classifier for rifle shots
surname Qiang
lit. impervious to sword or spear (idiom)/fig. invulnerable/untouchable/thick-skinned/impervious to criticism

sentences.english: Although the surface of a pair of invulnerability look, or feel tired heart.
sentences.chinese: 儘管表面一副刀槍不入的樣子，還是常感覺到心累。

sentences.english: The police found an arsenal of knives and guns in the terrorists' hideout.
sentences.chinese: 警方在恐怖分子的藏身地發現大批刀槍。

sentences.english: If you do not have to guns and knives into the practice, first to silence is golden.
sentences.chinese: 如果你還沒有修煉到刀槍不入，就先做到沉默是金。

sentences.english: Haven't you noticed that people whose death is caused by weapons are usually weapon- carriers themselves?
sentences.chinese: 君不見死於刀槍下的人，都是挾帶武器的人？

sentences.english: Never put the bayonets and guns away.
sentences.chinese: 和平時期也不能馬放南山，刀槍入庫。

sentences.english: He said we must slick up our swords and guns, and get ready.
sentences.chinese: 他說我們得擦亮了刀槍，做好準備。

sentences.english: Capture a vermin swiftly to field, the tail poisons needle match weapon.
sentences.chinese: 飛到田間捉害蟲，尾巴毒針賽刀槍。

sentences.english: There's a sense of invulnerability when you're making a movie.
sentences.chinese: 當你拍電影的時候，你會覺得自己是刀槍不入的。

sentences.english: The first year, these people everybody invulnerability, who also refused to go to blood collection.
sentences.chinese: 頭一年，這些人個個刀槍不入，誰也不肯去採血。

sentences.english: To make spear and shield and sword as much a part of me as my own beating heart.
sentences.chinese: 讓刀槍盾牌和我跳動的心臟一樣成爲我身體的一部分。

sentences.english: They have marched to the ballot-box in face of gleaming weapons, wounds and death.
sentences.chinese: 他們在閃光的刀槍面前冒着生命的危險衝向投票箱。

sentences.english: Love rules without a sword and bind without a cord.
sentences.chinese: 愛情統治不用刀槍，捆綁不用繩索。
